slvrsluger | a poker blog

Welcome to my experimental poker blog. Here you will find graphs, thoughts, PLO analysis, and an honest account of my journey on Poker Mountain.

I recently moved back to the united states and am giving live pot-limit-omaha [the greate game] an honest shot after nearly a decade of living abroad and playing professionally online.

The Mountain (its alive)
